message:
SYSTEM: MariaNavas_STLab_Research_Stay.pptx: Diapositiva {9}
Añotador is a temporal tagger for Spanish and English. It is able to find and normalize dates, times, durations and sets (temporal expressions that repeat periodically, such as “monthly”, “twice a year” or “every Tuesday”). There is a demo available in its webpage, and can be called as webservice or downloaded from GitHub (where all the code and a docker image are available).
speaker: SYSTEM
